headline: McCormick (MKC) Valuation Check After Disappointing Earnings And Softer Profit Outlook
summary: McCormick (MKC) is back in focus after its latest quarter showed higher sales but profits that fell short of expectations, along with a softer earnings outlook that put cost pressures and planned price increases front and center. See our latest analysis for McCormick. The weak profit forecast and cost concerns have fed into recent price action, with the 30 day share price return of -11.75% and year to date share price return of -9.65% both negative, while the 1 year total shareholder return...
